channel.title: What causes this?
channel.description: [code=JAVA]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.checkLog(server.java:230) at server.checkHost(server.java:220) at server.run(server.java:288) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-10" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:26917) at client.process(client.java:25099) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:289) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code][code=Java] if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastSave > 120000 && !inTrade){ savegame(false); // sM("Your profile has been automatically saved"); lastSave = System.currentTimeMillis();[/code]

item.title: What causes this?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.checkLog(server.java:230) at server.checkHost(server.java:220) at server.run(server.java:288) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-10" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:26917) at client.process(client.java:25099) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:289) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastSave > 120000 && !inTrade){ savegame(false); // sM("Your profile has been automatically saved"); lastSave = System.currentTimeMillis();
